def max_time_until_bowl_dropped(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (n, a) in test_cases:
        a = sorted(a, reverse=True)
        minn = a[-1]
        minnind = a.index(minn)
        total = n * minn
        total -= minnind
        results.append(total)
    return results

    results = []
    for (n, a) in test_cases:
        a = sorted(a, reverse=True)
        minn = a[-1]
        minnind = a.index(minn)
        total = n / minn
        total += minnind
        results.append(total)
    return results
